Posts.Content: Nov 25, 2012 09:15PM Beth10288 wrote: I have one even better not only do I have bilateral cancer, I also have a very rare former cancer that is 1-2% of cancers - Mucinous.  The doctor wants to do an heredity study on me as both are so rare.  Both cancers are very treatable so that is not an issue so might go ahead with it.  Will probably opt for radition as both tumors are so small unless the doctor strongly  feels differently.,  I do know that I will have to go in every six months for MRI's and Mammograms.
Posts.Title: synchronous bilateral breast cancer mmaring6131 SummerAngel
